name: Across: The Animals Adventure
description:
JUMP fast, but carefully!
DODGE away from rolling logs!

COLLECT TEAM
Help the little lamb Jack to gather his team of cute animals! Pass the levels and unlock new heroes! There are more than 20 animals are available in the game for FREE!

Jump between the logs, get to the finish and open the next friend!

Levels are completely generated, so count only on your attentiveness and agility.

More than 100+ levels are available, with smoothly increasing difficulty!

DOWNLOAD Across: The Animals Adventure now and to try for FREE
